meta.title: Funeral Transport - Hearse, Limousines & Special Vehicles | Barringtons
meta.description: Traditional and alternative funeral transport options. Hearse, limousines, horse-drawn carriages, motorcycle hearses, and eco-friendly vehicles available.
meta.keywords: funeral transport Liverpool, hearse hire, funeral limousines, horse drawn hearse, motorcycle hearse

intro.title: Transport Options
intro.subtitle: From traditional hearses to unique alternatives, we offer various transport options to create a fitting final journey.

vehicles.name: Fully Electric Etive Hearse
vehicles.description: Our fully electric Coleman Milne Etive Hearse is supporting us on our journey to net zero emissions for our business.

vehicles.name: LFC / EFC Hearse
vehicles.description: The LFC/EFC Hearses are perfect for people who's main interest is one of our great football teams.

vehicles.name: Horse-Drawn Hearse
vehicles.description: Horse drawn hearses bring drama to the funeral procession. They are available in Black, White or Gold.

vehicles.name: Motorcycle Hearse
vehicles.description: Motorcycle hearses are perfect final journey for motorbike enthusiasts. They have a range of hearses available.

vehicles.name: Morris Minor Hearse
vehicles.description: Classic cars from various eras for a nostalgic farewell.

vehicles.name: Landrover Hearses
vehicles.description: Landrover Hearses are great for anyone who loved the outdoors or off road enthusiasts.

special.title: Special Requests
special.description: We can arrange almost any type of transport you can imagine - from VW camper vans to fire engines. Let us know your ideas and we'll make it happen.
